Name: Civil War: 1862
About the game: Civil War: 1862 is the prequel to the highly acclaimed Civil War: 1863 ! Relive iconic battles of the American Civil War. Take command of both the Union and Confederate forces in this exciting turn-based strategy game. Key Features: 8 Mission ‘Tutorial’ campaign. 5 Mission ‘Fix Bayonets’ campaign. 8 Mission ‘Steel and Thunder’ campaign. 8 Mission ‘Colossus’ campaign. 8 Mission ‘Fresh Troops’ campaign. 8 Mission ‘Death and Glory’ campaign. 8 Mission ‘Broken Line’ campaign. 8 Mission ‘Shot and Shell’ campaign comprising a series on non-historical game challenges. All missions can be played as both sides  (except the tutorial). 8 Unique Civil War Units: - Infantry with Muskets. - Infantry with Rifled Muskets. - Artillery. - Generals. - Wagons. - Naval Gunboats. - Dismounted and Mounted Cavalry. Four classes of infantry – Raw, Average, Veteran and Elite. Different infantry formations: unformed, line for shooting and column for charging! Detailed Combat Analysis. Flank Attacks . Strategic Movement. Hours of Gameplay
